tweet: ICYMI: Hearing first-hand stories of workplace & housing discrimination from Florida #LGBTQ leaders, it's easy to see why we must pass the #EqualityAct in the Senate - no American should have to choose between their homes & careers & living their truth! https://www.tampabay.com/business/rep-crist-meets-with-local-lgbtq-leaders-as-equality-bill-heads-to-us-senate-20190528/ …

Great news – Congress passed an extension of the National Flood Insurance Program! But certain Republicans are still blocking vital disaster relief. Stop holding assistance for Florida and Puerto Rico hostage!

Hurricane season starts Saturday & the Nat Flood Insurance Program expires tomorrow. Republicans who blocked the disaster relief bill are hurting FL & Puerto Rico, but also blocked flood insurance extension. Stop with the games and let’s get on with the peoples’ business ASAP!

Proud to secure $10 million to fight #redtide – but that’s just the start.
